Title: Prohibits internet service providers from disclosing personally identifiable information under certain circumstances
Summary: Prohibits internet service providers from disclosing personally identifiable information where a consumer requests that his or her information not be disseminated; defines terms; makes exceptions; imposes a civil penalty.
LawCode: Add ยง399-k, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting internet service providers from disclosing personally identifiable information in the event that a consumer requests that his or her information not be disseminated
